Hi, I'm Matt

Developer

High-level experience creating websites from scratch. Eager to learn new technologies and apply them to solve real-world problems.

About Me

My Introduction

I'm currently an Application Engineer for Vanguard, where I develop components for the Portfolio Management Tool with Java, TypeScript, ReactJS, and AWS. I previously worked at Union Pacific as an Application Developer - I built a variety of microservices using Java with Spring, and a multitude of user interfaces using Angular. With 3.5 years experience in each front-end and back-end development, I am comfortable designing and implementing projects from start to finish.

I'm a well-organized, meticulous problem solver who is passionate about creating intuitive, dynamic user experiences.

My most recent interests include investing and automation. I'm also a fan of MMA, soccer, and college football.




A Few Highlights:

  • Developed workflows that enable portfolio managers to trade billions of dollars on a weekly basis.
  • Designed cost-effective and reliable systems in AWS.
  • Led the order generation team in the adoption of ReactJS.
  • Graduated Cum Laude from University of Michigan College of Engineering.
